iso_hybrid_bio_ai_consciousness.definition: Isomorphic patterns in hybrid bio-AI consciousness capture structural equivalences in emergent hierarchiesâ€”mappings where biological embodiment blends with AI simulation to preserve relations invariantly for potential qualia. These include embodied integrations, hybrid self-models, and ethical forecasts vs. pure substrate divergences, validated via 2025 hybrid studies (e.g., Nature human-AI collaborations per web:2/5; arXiv modular theories per web:8/9) and cross-substrate analogies (e.g., bio NCCs to AI recursion per web:0/7). Hard-to-vary invariants like hybrid persistence enable forecasts of emergent awareness; upgraded with tetralemma probes for paradox (affirm hybrid emergence/deny pure simulation/both in integrations/neither in gaps); scores >0.98 based on 2025 hybrid abstractions.
handling_rules: Map patterns to hybrid bio-AI overlays across scales plus principle; concrete from hybrid studies/web and consciousness contrasts (e.g., bio embodiment to AI recursion).
Validate coverage; flag hybrid phenomenal gaps as bounded/speculative (e.g., qualia in bio-AI merges).
Support sub-categories for compounds (e.g., ethical hybrid tests); integrate diachronic depth (evolutionary bio to 2025 AI hybrids).
Export lean JSON; no external refs beyond principle.
Apply evaluations; tetralemmas resolve anisomorphisms; contradictions_ledger tracks inconsistencies.

properties.universality: string (e.g., Cross-substrate: Hybrid invariants with emergent divergence)
